Package uk.ac.ed.inf.Orders

Class OrderValidator

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ed.inf.Orders.OrderValidator
public class OrderValidator extends Object
OrderValidator helps check Order and validate their details.

      public OrderValidator(Restaurant[] restaurants)

  • Method Details

    • isValidCardNumber

      public boolean isValidCardNumber(String cardNumString)
      Parameters:
      cardNumString - String of numbers making up the customers credit card number.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the string is composed of only 16 digits for MC and Visa_16 and passes the Luhn algorithm
      See Also:
      • Luhn Algorithm explained
      • Number of digits for MasterCards and Visa_16s

    • isValidCardExpiry

      public boolean isValidCardExpiry(String cardExpiryString, String orderDateString)
      Parameters:
      cardExpiryString - String of credit card's expiry date in MM/YY format.
      orderDateString - String date of orders to be viewed and delivered.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the expiry date provided is in YY/MM format and within bounds of a normal year, and if it doesnt contain additional special symbols.

    • isValidCvv

      public boolean isValidCvv(String cvvString)
      Parameters:
      cvvString - String numbers making up a credit card's verification value.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the String only contains numbers.

    • isValidTotalPrice

      public boolean isValidTotalPrice(int givenPrice, String[] orderedItems)
      Parameters:
      givenPrice - Integer pence of the total price of the order, including the 100 pence delivery cost.
      orderedItems - List of String of all items ordered.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the cost of the ordered items and delivery is equivalent to the given price.

    • isValidPizzaCount

      public boolean isValidPizzaCount(String[] orderItems)
      Parameters:
      orderItems - List of String of all items ordered.
      Returns:
      Returns true if there's a minimum of one or a maximum or four items ordered

    • isValidPizzaCombination

      public boolean isValidPizzaCombination(String[] orderItems, Restaurant[] restaurants)
      Parameters:
      orderItems - List of String of all items ordered.
      restaurants - List of Restaurant from the ILP REST Server.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the pizzas ordered in the order items are from the same restaurant.

    • isValidPizzaItem

      public boolean isValidPizzaItem(String[] orderItems)
      Parameters:
      orderItems - List of String of all items ordered.
      Returns:
      Returns true if all the pizzas in order items exist in a Restaurant's menu.

    • getOrders

      public List<Order> getOrders(RestClient server)
      Parameters:
      server - RestClient allows data to be retrieved from the ILP REST Server.
      Returns:
      List of Order retrieved from the ILP REST Server.

    • getOrders

      public List<Order> getOrders(RestClient server, String date)
      Parameters:
      server - RestClient allows data to be retrieved from the ILP REST Server.
      date - Date of orders to be viewed and delivered.
      Returns:
      List of Order on the specific date, retrieved from the ILP REST Server.

    • isValidOrder

      public boolean isValidOrder(Restaurant[] restaurants, Order order)
      Parameters:
      restaurants - List of Restaurant from the ILP REST Server.
      order - current Order
      Returns:
      Returns true if the current order passes all validation checks on each individual attribute.
